name: Choices (demo)
description:
Choices is a 2D platformer story-based game in-development. It features you, the player, and your adventure to retrieve your dog who was taken from you by a mysterious red figure. You must journey through various terrains, avoiding obstacles and other dangers that may come across your way. Along the way, you'll come upon a multitude of characters and creatures whom you can choose to interact with. Whether you treat them as friend or foe, remember: your choices matter. 

This game was inspired by a multitude of games including Super Meat Boy and Lisa.
